query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Employment precariousness and work-life balance needs in Europe 2005-2018
result.description: Report examining the quantitative evidence of exposure to precarious employment and consequences for worklife balance risks across EU28 and Norway before during and after the Great Recession Published as a EUROSHIP Working Paper tentative title Changing employment precariousness and worklife balance needs in Europe 20052018 510000 words

result.description: The deliverable presents data fusion techniques for creating synthesized data such as origin-destination matrixes and freight activity data that can be used as input to models and tools developed in WP4. The deliverable is the outcome of task 3.3.
